ipi-mrib:mrib.description: Top level container for all multicast RIB configuration and state data

ipv4.description: Top level container for all IPV4 multicast RIB configuration and state    data

vrfs.description: container for vrf level MRIB IPv4 configuration and state information

vrf.description: VRF level MRIB IPv4 configuration and state information

vrf-name.description: Use this attribute to specify the VRF
Use this attribute to specify the VRF

multicast-routing-enable.description: Use this attribute to turn on/off multicast routing on the router when turned off, the multicast protocol daemon remains present, but does not perform multicast functions. When multicast routing is enabled, the MRIB re-creates tunnels, and starts processing any VIF addition/deletion requests, MRT addition/deletion requests, and any multicast forwarding events.

bidirectional-forwarding-enable.description: Use this attribute to enable/disable Bidirection PIM Capability.

dense-mode-multicast-routes.description: Count of dense mode multicast routes

sparse-mode-multicast-routes.description: Count of sparse mode multicast routes

wrong-VIF-sent.description: Count of wrong vif receive sent

immediate-stat-updates-sent.description: Count of immediate stat updates sent

timed-stat-updates-sent.description: Count of timed stat updates sent

register-nacks-received.description: Count of register negative acknowledgements received

no-cache-receive-rate.description: No cache receive rate specified in no-cache-events/sec

register-packet-sent-rate.description: Register packet sent rate specified in pkts/sec

vrf-name.description: Use this attribute to specify the VRF

multicast-routing-enable.description: Use this attribute to turn on/off multicast routing on the router when turned off, the multicast protocol daemon remains present, but does not perform multicast functions. When multicast routing is enabled, the MRIB re-creates tunnels, and starts processing any VIF addition/deletion requests, MRT addition/deletion requests, and any multicast forwarding events.

bidirectional-forwarding-enable.description: Use this attribute to enable/disable Bidirection PIM Capability.

route-limit.description: container for MRIB IP multicast route limit configuration and state    information

config.description: MRIB IP multicast route limit configuration

maximum-routes.description: Use this attribute to limit the number of multicast routes that can be added to a multicast routing table. It generates an error message when the limit is exceeded.

warning-threshold.description: Use this attribute to limit the number of multicast routes that can be added to a multicast routing table. It generates an error message when the limit is exceeded. If the threshold parameter is set, a threshold warning message is generated when this threshold is exceeded and the message continues to occur until the number of mroutes reaches the limit set by the limit argument.

state.description: MRIB IP multicast route limit operational state

maximum-routes.description: Use this attribute to limit the number of multicast routes that can be added to a multicast routing table. It generates an error message when the limit is exceeded.

warning-threshold.description: Use this attribute to limit the number of multicast routes that can be added to a multicast routing table. It generates an error message when the limit is exceeded. If the threshold parameter is set, a threshold warning message is generated when this threshold is exceeded and the message continues to occur until the number of mroutes reaches the limit set by the limit argument.

options.description: Use this attribute to specify debug options

state.description: MRIB IP multicast route debug operational state

options.description: Use this attribute to specify debug options

terminal-debug-status.description: Use this attribute to display MRIB terminal debugging information

multicast-routes.description: MRIB VRF MCAST Routes operational state container

multicast-route.description: MRIB VRF MCAST Route operational state instance

state.description: MRIB VRF MCAST Route State Container

outgoing-interfaces.description: MRIB VRF MCAST Routes OIF operational state container

outgoing-interface.description: MRIB VRF MCAST Route OIF operational state instance

state.description: MRIB VRF MCAST Route OIF State Container

interfaces.description: container for vrf level MRIB IPv4 configuration and state information

interface.description: Interface level MRIB IPv4 configuration and state information

name.description: Use this attribute to specify the interface
Use this attribute to specify the interface

ttl-threshold.description: Use this attribute to configure the time-to-live (TTL) threshold of packets being forwarded out of an interface. Only multicast packets with a TTL value greater than the threshold are forwarded out of the interface.

name.description: Use this attribute to specify the interface

ttl-threshold.description: Use this attribute to configure the time-to-live (TTL) threshold of packets being forwarded out of an interface. Only multicast packets with a TTL value greater than the threshold are forwarded out of the interface.

module-name.description: Module which installed this multicast route entry[PIM/IGMP/MLD]
